5504.title: Your personal data is used for limited purposes

tosdr.case: Your personal data is used for limited purposes
tosdr.tldr: We collect your Personal Information when voluntarily submitted by you. The Personal Information you provide is used to a create user account and login credentials for the purpose of using certain features of the Services and/or fulfilling your specific requests, unless you give us permission to use it in another manner. We will not collect your Personal Information unless you give it to us. “Personal Information” means any information that is classified as sensitive because it is personally identifiable such as a verified name, fingerprints or other biometric data, email address, street address, telephone number or social security number.

tosdr.case: The user is informed about security practices
tosdr.tldr: Data that is personally identifiable such as email address, chat history or mobile number is classified as sensitive and therefore encrypted by policy when in motion or stored at rest using an SHA-256 unique hash ID.

5518.title: This service is only available to users 13+

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age
tosdr.tldr: Our Services are available only to individuals who are at least 13 years old (“Minimum Age).

5521.title: Users agree not to submit illegal content

tosdr.case: Users agree not to submit illegal content
tosdr.tldr: Your use of the Services and User Content will not infringe the rights of any other party (including intellectual property rights and privacy rights) or violate any applicable law, rule, or regulation;

tosdr.case: The service has a no refund policy
tosdr.tldr: Refund Policy: All sales of Minds tokens are final and non-refundable. Any disputes should be directed to info@minds.com.

5529.title: Users are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses they may incur by downloading materials

tosdr.case: Users are responsible for any risks, damages, or losses they may incur by downloading materials
tosdr.tldr: YOU UNDERSTAND THAT WE CANNOT AND DO NOT GUARANTEE OR WARRANT THAT FILES AVAILABLE FOR DOWNLOADING FROM THE INTERNET OR THE SERVICES WILL BE FREE OF VIRUSES OR OTHER DESTRUCTIVE CODE. YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR IMPLEMENTING SUFFICIENT PROCEDURES AND CHECKPOINTS TO SATISFY YOUR PARTICULAR REQUIREMENTS FOR ANTI-VIRUS PROTECTION AND ACCURACY OF DATA INPUT AND OUTPUT, AND FOR MAINTAINING A MEANS EXTERNAL TO OUR SITE FOR ANY RECONSTRUCTION OF ANY LOST DATA.

5531.title: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided

tosdr.case: The service does not guarantee accuracy or reliability of the information provided
tosdr.tldr: MINDS DOES NOT WARRANT OR MAKE ANY REPRESENTATION REGARDING USE OR THE RESULT OF USE OF THE CONTENT IN TERMS OF ACCURACY, RELIABILITY, OR OTHERWISE.

5533.title: You waive your right to a class action.

tosdr.case: You waive your right to a class action.
tosdr.tldr: No Class Arbitrations, Class Actions or Representative Actions.

5534.title: The court of law governing the terms is in the State of Connecticut

tosdr.case: The court of law governing the terms is in location X
tosdr.tldr: These Terms will be governed by and construed and enforced in accordance with the laws of the State of Connecticut, without regard to conflict of law rules or principles (whether of the State of Connecticut or any other jurisdiction) that would cause the application of the laws of any other jurisdiction.
